snippet: Attorney General Eric H. Holder Jr. was admonished for appointing two United States attorneys to investigate disclosures instead of a special prosecutor.
abstract: Republican members of the Senate Judiciary Committee strongly criticize the decision by Attorney General Eric H Holder Jr to appoint two United States attorneys to investigate leaks of classified national security information, saying that the move is not enough and that he should appoint a special prosecutor.
lead_paragraph: Attorney General Eric H. Holder Jr. was admonished for appointing two United States attorneys to investigate disclosures instead of a special prosecutor.

headline.main: Republican Senators Criticize Holder Over Response to Leaks
headline.print_headline: Republican Senators Criticize Holder Over Response to Leaks
